prismicHomepage.dataString: {"carousel":[{"title":[{"type":"heading1","text":"Ueno things!","spans":[]}],"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"All things from the people of Ueno, a digital agency in SF, NYC, LA and Iceland. More info on www.ueno.co","spans":[{"start":4,"end":10,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"id":"Wcp2wSwAAK_IP9Xn","type":"article","tags":[],"slug":"the-9-most-important-lessons-from-my-first-year-atueno","lang":"en-us","uid":"the-3-most-important-lessons-from-my-first-year-at-ueno","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false}},{"start":94,"end":105,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"link_type":"Web","url":"https://ueno.co","target":"_blank"}}]}],"color":"#93cfe3"},{"title":[{"type":"heading1","text":"Nothing is someone else‚Äôs problem","spans":[]}],"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"We pick up the trash we didn‚Äôt put down. Not everything is about us, and we succeed when people around us succeed. We want to stay small, no matter how big we get.","spans":[]}],"color":"#fe5830"},{"title":[{"type":"heading1","text":"Figure things out","spans":[]}],"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Life is change, and we adapt. That‚Äôs how we grow. We say ‚ÄúYes we can,‚Äù even if we‚Äôre not sure exactly how. We‚Äôll figure it out. We want to look back and be amazed by how much we‚Äôve grown.","spans":[]}],"color":"#ffce5a"}],"column_title":[{"type":"heading1","text":"Who we are, and who we want to be","spans":[]}],"column_subheading":[{"type":"heading1","text":"A few things you should know about Ueno","spans":[]}],"content_columns":[{"title":[{"type":"heading2","text":"Bring the chocolate","spans":[]}],"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"We want to exceed expectations. To give them more than they knew they wanted. Be the best at everything we do. Our standards are very high, and we work very hard to live up to them.","spans":[{"start":11,"end":30,"type":"strong"},{"start":45,"end":49,"type":"em"}]}]},{"title":[{"type":"heading2","text":"We‚Äôre all in this together","spans":[]}],"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"We‚Äôre all different. We‚Äôre all equal. We build bridges, not walls. We have bad days. We make mistakes, and learn from them. It‚Äôs okay. We forgive ourselves and others.","spans":[]}]},{"title":[{"type":"heading2","text":"Life is short, enjoy it","spans":[]}],"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Life is short and kind of ridiculous. We‚Äôll all be dead soon. So why not enjoy it? We are stupid in a good way. Foolish in a better way. We are here, we‚Äôre alive, and it‚Äôs pretty damn great.","spans":[{"start":184,"end":189,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"link_type":"Media","name":"1.jpg","kind":"image","url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test%2F398af4df-f2c1-44b0-9486-5cfe7d6d0361_1.jpg","size":"38864","height":"704","width":"704"}}]}]}],"articles_title":[{"type":"heading1","text":"From our lovely people","spans":[]}],"articles_subheading":[{"type":"heading1","text":"They love to write","spans":[]}],"featured_articles":[{"article":{"id":"Wcp2wSwAAK_IP9Xn","type":"article","tags":[],"slug":"the-9-most-important-lessons-from-my-first-year-atueno","lang":"en-us","uid":"the-3-most-important-lessons-from-my-first-year-at-ueno","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false}},{"article":{"id":"WfH4ASoAANpzUxLH","type":"article","tags":[],"slug":"uenos-culturevalues","lang":"en-us","uid":"uenos-culture-values","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false}}],"body":[],"meta_title":[{"type":"heading1","text":"Home","spans":[]}],"meta_description":[{"type":"heading1","text":"This is homepage description text used for helmet.","spans":[]}],"meta_image":{"dimensions":{"width":1200,"height":630},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/e380d138f9be2647bfc2507f9f6b682d18b54e2a_the-interview.jpg"},"custom_pages":[{"custom_page":{"id":"WgHVDSUAAGB4L9Mk","type":"custom_page","tags":[],"slug":"faq","lang":"en-us","uid":"faq","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false}},{"custom_page":{"id":"WfEk4SIAAJulOEDi","type":"custom_page","tags":[],"slug":"product","lang":"en-us","uid":"my-custom-page","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false}}],"header_navigation":[{"header_link":{"id":"WcpUXCwAAMpdPz4X","type":"homepage","tags":["page"],"slug":"ueno-things","lang":"en-us","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false},"link_title":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Home","spans":[]}]},{"header_link":{"id":"WvsHzyAAACxp5ip2","type":"custom_page","tags":[],"slug":"words-of-wisdom","lang":"en-us","uid":"articles","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false},"link_title":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Articles","spans":[]}]},{"header_link":{"id":"Wvq7ZSAAANgq5NNf","type":"custom_page","tags":[],"slug":"buy-things.","lang":"en-us","uid":"products","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false},"link_title":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Products","spans":[]}]},{"header_link":{"id":"WgHVDSUAAGB4L9Mk","type":"custom_page","tags":[],"slug":"faq","lang":"en-us","uid":"faq","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false},"link_title":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"FAQ","spans":[]}]},{"header_link":{"id":"WfCnRiIAAAybNhG8","type":"about","tags":["page"],"slug":"such-ueno.","lang":"en-us","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false},"link_title":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"About","spans":[]}]}],"footer_navigation":[{"footer_link":{"id":"WcpUXCwAAMpdPz4X","type":"homepage","tags":["page"],"slug":"ueno-things","lang":"en-us","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false},"link_title":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Home","spans":[]}]},{"footer_link":{"id":"WvsHzyAAACxp5ip2", document.dataString:
{"title":[{"type":"heading1","text":"The 9 most important lessons from my first year at¬†Ueno","spans":[]}],"short_description":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Last September, I started my first full-time job as a product designer at Ueno. I had applied online and did a brief trial period where I worked with Ueno for three days.","spans":[]}],"publication_date":"2017-10-17","author":{"id":"WcuwBikAADBphmkR","type":"author","tags":[],"slug":"steph-jeong","lang":"en-us","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false},"image":{"dimensions":{"width":704,"height":704},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/d33e20942bfd8a4586d9694b727ec06e9244b5f2_1.jpg"},"body":[{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Last September, I started my first full-time job as a product designer at Ueno. I had applied online and did a brief trial period where I worked with Ueno for three days. There, I met¬†my future mentor Carolyn. I guess she thought I was okay, but she probably hired me for my amazing but mostly dumb tweet:","spans":[{"start":184,"end":208,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"link_type":"Web","url":"https://medium.com/ueno/building-a-culture-of-mentorship-c92032e03d59"}}]}]}},{"slice_type":"tweets","slice_label":null,"items":[{"tweet":{"url":"https://twitter.com/jeongsteph/status/572284330271232000","author_name":"Steph Jeong","author_url":"https://twitter.com/jeongsteph","html":"

I just realized a dog is called a dog because the word looks like a dog!!! üê©üê©

— Steph Jeong (@jeongsteph) March 2, 2015
\n","width":550,"height":null,"type":"rich","cache_age":"3153600000","provider_name":"Twitter","provider_url":"https://twitter.com","version":"1.0","embed_url":"https://twitter.com/jeongsteph/status/572284330271232000","title":"Steph Jeong on Twitter: \"I just realized a dog is called a dog because the word looks like a dog!!! üê©üê©\""}}],"primary":{}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"I actually had no idea what I was looking for in a job. And, looking back, I probably had no idea what being a designer at Ueno even meant. But after the trial period, I accepted my offer because everyone on the team was better than me, and at least I could learn by watching them.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"And I was right. For the first three months, I had to constantly play catch-up and improve my craft, from sharpening my attention to detail to flexing my higher-level problem-solving skills. The months after that were even harder, because I had to master the soft skills that you‚Äôre not taught in school. Obviously, I still have a long way to go, but I‚Äôll share some I‚Äôve learned so far.","spans":[]},{"type":"heading3","text":"1. Be more than empathetic. Make¬†friends.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":800,"height":323},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/72e46aacbe5575fde1e0e2435f86aba7344cf190_s1.png","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/6bdab1c2c31deeeb8d9f3f9618267018749d7324_s1.png"}},"caption":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"By Ketnipz","spans":[{"start":3,"end":10,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"link_type":"Web","url":"https://www.instagram.com/ketnipz/?hl=en"}}]}]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Empathy~~~! (*jazz hands*) It‚Äôs a word so overused in design that it‚Äôs practically lost its meaning, but it‚Äôs critical to a project‚Äôs success. Designers usually talk about empathy with users, but being empathetic with your teammates and clients is equally important. How can you work well with them if you don‚Äôt understand them?","spans":[{"start":13,"end":25,"type":"em"}]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"The first time I worked with a client on my own, I struggled. A lot. I became defensive about my design decisions, felt misunderstood and underestimated, and was frustrated all the time. The work suffered because of it. So I asked for advice from our resident client-whisperer,¬†Luisa. She had an amazing personality, but that wasn‚Äôt the only reason why everyone loved her.","spans":[{"start":278,"end":283,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"link_type":"Web","url":"https://twitter.com/luisamf"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"Her magic was simple: everyone likes working with nice people, but when you treat the people you work with as¬†friends, everything just gets easier. Get to know them, their stories, their hobbies‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääand share more about yourself too. You‚Äôll be less likely to argue, more open-minded to each others‚Äô ideas, and you‚Äôll both understand that you want the best outcome for the project and for each other. And with that, you‚Äôll develop the trust needed for a great working relationship.","spans":[{"start":110,"end":117,"type":"em"}]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"This doesn‚Äôt just apply to clients, but to coworkers too. A homebody like me doesn‚Äôt dread going into the office on Monday, because I truly love the people I work with. We come from all over the world, and it‚Äôs sometimes difficult to understand everyone‚Äôs different perspectives and backgrounds. So we make sure to take the time to learn about each other and understand where people are coming from. We share our work problems, our life problems, and our dumb jokes. We know when to provide more support and when to be more critical with each other. Sure, we‚Äôll still disagree sometimes, but we know people are always coming from a good place because we care about each other.","spans":[]},{"type":"heading3","text":"2. Talking more doesn‚Äôt give you more authority. Listening well¬†can.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":300,"height":169},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test%2Fa98d81cc-cb69-4cb4-847b-aad067e2ff74_s2.gif","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test%2Fa98d81cc-cb69-4cb4-847b-aad067e2ff74_s2.gif"}},"caption":[]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"I used to get nervous about meetings because I felt like I always needed to say something smart to impress everyone. When I couldn‚Äôt come up with anything smart to say, I would just try to say¬†anything¬†because otherwise I felt like I didn‚Äôt contribute.","spans":[{"start":193,"end":201,"type":"em"}]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"When I shared this concern with Carolyn, she told me, ‚ÄúIf you have nothing to say, there‚Äôs nothing wrong with just listening.‚Äù She mentioned¬†Halli, our CEO, as an example of someone who mostly listens. Most of our internal meetings with Halli are led by other people, sharing their work and getting feedback. He usually lets others give their opinions first, and makes space for people who are more shy. The only time Halli actually says something is when it‚Äôs absolutely needed, and this give his words a lot more weight.","spans":[{"start":141,"end":146,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"link_type":"Web","url":"http://twitter.com/iamharaldur"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"Some people might say this is because Halli is the CEO, and whatever he says probably feels very absolute, but you can also see something very similar with our producer¬†Kyle. When Kyle holds a meeting, you might not really notice him because he‚Äôs listening most of the time. When he talks, it‚Äôs to give someone else a chance to speak, or to help us ask/answer the right questions. Meetings just don‚Äôt run as well without him. Just by watching him, I‚Äôve learned that¬†you can be an incredibly valuable presence when you speak to move the discussion forward, rather than saying an opinion for the sake of having one.","spans":[{"start":169,"end":173,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"link_type":"Web","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/kgcaruso"}}]},{"type":"heading3","text":"3. Chill¬†out.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":480,"height":264},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test%2F4e5937bf-2154-4371-b7af-96fbfd1433b5_s3.gif","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test%2F4e5937bf-2154-4371-b7af-96fbfd1433b5_s3.gif"}},"caption":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"It me.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Over the past year, I‚Äôve improved a lot at the craft of design, but my biggest growth as a designer‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääand as a person‚Ää‚Äî‚Äähas been learning to relax and not stress out so much.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"Last year, I was the most anxious, paranoid person you could ever find on the planet. On my first business trip, I missed the flight back to San Francisco, and I honestly thought I‚Äôd never be able to get home. Classic overdramatic Steph.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"I called Carolyn from the airport on the verge of tears. She said something that I now remind myself of every day:","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"quote","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"quote":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"‚ÄúIf there‚Äôs nothing you can do about it, don‚Äôt worry about¬†it.‚Äù","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"She told me to go get some breakfast and chill in the airport for a while. And, when I finally feel okay, I can go to ask the people at the airline counter to take the next flight. She was right. I calmed down, made it back to SF, and now I always get to the airport two hours early.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"Of course, there are the (many) times I‚Äôm anxious about situations I¬†do¬†have control over. When something is ambiguous and daunting, it‚Äôs easy to get paralyzed by fear.¬†Where do I start? What if that‚Äôs wrong? What if I mess up?","spans":[{"start":69,"end":71,"type":"em"},{"start":169,"end":227,"type":"em"}]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"I‚Äôve messed up at work plenty of times, but have also seen how my anxiety gets in the way before anything even starts. After a year of diving into unknowns and coming out just fine, I‚Äôve learned to give myself some credit and think to myself that there‚Äôs no reason why I can‚Äôt do something. And even if it goes wrong, it‚Äôs not the end of the world. We‚Äôll figure it out, together.","spans":[]}]}}],"meta_title":[],"meta_description":[],"meta_image":{}}

title.text: The 9 most important lessons from my first year at¬†Ueno

raw.text: Last September, I started my first full-time job as a product designer at Ueno. I had applied online and did a brief trial period where I worked with Ueno for three days.

document.dataString: {"title":[{"type":"heading1","text":"Ueno‚Äôs Culture¬†Values","spans":[]}],"short_description":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"As Ueno has gone from one bearded guy in his living room to more than 50 people of 20 nationalities in four offices with real tables and chairs, we‚Äôve started thinking about how we can keep being ourselves.","spans":[]}],"publication_date":"2017-10-19","author":{"id":"WfH-zyoAAGN1UzEF","type":"author","tags":[],"slug":"haraldur-thorleifsson","lang":"en-us","link_type":"Document","isBroken":false},"image":{"dimensions":{"width":1400,"height":1037},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/afb9fe8fabab5172418aea5fe4096d8d7bcf027a_all-in-this-togeather.png"},"body":[{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"heading2","text":"Get ready for some hyperbolic words and nice¬†pictures","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"Here‚Äôs the thing. As Ueno has gone from one bearded guy in his living room to more than 50 people of 20 nationalities in four offices with real tables and chairs, we‚Äôve started thinking about how we can keep being ourselves, even as we grow and change.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"That‚Äôs where our six brand new Culture Values‚Ñ¢ come in. Carefully constructed by a crack team of Prussian scientists over a period of several months.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"So scroll down. Maybe you‚Äôll find something useful there too.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":1400,"height":1037},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/afb9fe8fabab5172418aea5fe4096d8d7bcf027a_all-in-this-togeather.png","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/f762a31d70a9c13d298605b2bcbe31f05be30e41_all-in-this-togeather.png"}},"caption":[]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"heading3","text":"1. We‚Äôre all in this¬†together","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"quote","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"quote":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"We are diverse, empathetic and open minded. We understand that people have different backgrounds and goals, but we are all trying to do our¬†best.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"We are fair. We listen, ask questions and respect different points of view (within reason). We build bridges, not walls. We have bad days. We make mistakes and learn from them to avoid making them again. We forgive ourselves and¬†others.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":1400,"height":1037},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/06e2f289eb251c677e403a3abcf45d81d88ab542_be-raw.png","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/c892d760cbd1655a2c9f862eb40f658068f753e6_be-raw.png"}},"caption":[]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"heading3","text":"2. Be¬†raw","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"quote","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"quote":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"We grow together with honesty. But we go further: we are raw. We are open, vulnerable, no-bullshit, straight to the point and ultra transparent.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"We don‚Äôt talk behind people‚Äôs backs, we go to the source, and tell people how we feel and what we¬†think.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":1400,"height":1037},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/c3276c93cf0d0ed712ee848ccaa32c23084e5d43_figure-it-out.png","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/f43299ce8bf73ef18a8a673047b810a8a823182e_figure-it-out.png"}},"caption":[]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"heading3","text":"3. Figure it¬†out","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"quote","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"quote":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Life is change. At increasingly faster speeds. We know our success relies on how fast we can adapt and that means doing things we didn‚Äôt know we could do. Going outside of our comfort zone and saying yes-we-can, even if we may have no idea how we‚Äôll eventually do it. We‚Äôll figure it¬†out.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"We learn fast. We look at our past selves and can‚Äôt believe how much we‚Äôve¬†grown.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":1400,"height":1037},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/7e2702ec050ba75489faa19bc52c488d420e5302_nothing-is-someone-elses-problem.png","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/5967a54303c2e18f025d4730eee46715f73fe468_nothing-is-someone-elses-problem.png"}},"caption":[]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"heading3","text":"4. Nothing here is someone else‚Äôs¬†problem","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"quote","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"quote":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"We understand that we have a lot more power over ourselves than others. We are introspective and look for ways to be better individuals.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"We pick up the trash we didn‚Äôt put down. We are the solution to other people‚Äôs problems, even the ones they didn‚Äôt know they¬†had.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"We know that not everything is about us, and that we succeed when the people around us succeed. We are small, no matter how big we¬†are.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"By the way, this one is more or less directly stolen from Facebook. Sorry Mark!","spans":[{"start":0,"end":79,"type":"em"}]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":1400,"height":1037},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/791db8119c27ba0dcd71eecf67bcb4abe57ff39d_bring-the-chocolate.png","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/858dd731c94ea0358ad2c0353d054c2ebfb88cd7_bring-the-chocolate.png"}},"caption":[]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"heading3","text":"5. Bring the chocolate","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"quote","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"quote":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"We go beyond and never settle. We surprise and delight, think ahead and give people more than they knew they¬†wanted.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"We know there are always ways to make things better, and better, and better. And we want to be the best. At everything we do. Our standards are very, very high, and we work very, very hard to live up to¬†them.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"For more on bringing the chocolate, read this.","spans":[{"start":0,"end":45,"type":"em"},{"start":36,"end":46,"type":"hyperlink","data":{"link_type":"Web","url":"https://medium.com/ueno/designers-should-always-bring-the-chocolate-7eb597300215","target":"_blank"}}]}]}},{"slice_type":"image","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"image":{"dimensions":{"width":1400,"height":1037},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/6fbd86a000cde2f29bbf6e4c054fff282f3e0ef3_enjoy-life.png","dfds":{"dimensions":{"width":500,"height":500},"alt":null,"copyright":null,"url":"https://ueno-starter-kit-universally-test.cdn.prismic.io/ueno-starter-kit-universally-test/c8530794e5b991d03dac8e33602362e7dce90015_enjoy-life.png"}},"caption":[]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"heading3","text":"6. Life is short, enjoy¬†it","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"quote","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"quote":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"We know life is ridiculous. We will all be dead soon. We are playful. We are stupid in a good way. Foolish in a better¬†way.","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"We don‚Äôt live in the past, we don‚Äôt worry too much about the future. We are here, we‚Äôre alive, and that‚Äôs pretty damn¬†great.","spans":[]}]}},{"slice_type":"text","slice_label":null,"items":[{}],"primary":{"text":[{"type":"paragraph","text":"Ok, there you go. That‚Äôs us (at least on our good days).","spans":[]},{"type":"paragraph","text":"Talk soon!\nHalli","spans":[]}]}}],"meta_title":[],"meta_description":[],"meta_image":{}}

raw.text: As Ueno has gone from one bearded guy in his living room to more than 50 people of 20 nationalities in four offices with real tables and chairs, we‚Äôve started thinking about how we can keep being ourselves.

bio.text: Design Director (also founder and things) at Ueno.
